mail.title: Information from [Knowledge] on add user
mail.contents:
There was a user of registration request. In the administrator of the page, please check.
------------------------------------------ This e-mail has been sent automatically from the system. Please understand that it can not reply to this email.
mail.description: If the setting of user registration is set to "approve by administrator", When there is a request for user registration, System notify the administrator of e-mail.
